name: How Far Away (Pixel Impressionism #2)
description:
Our soul is always carried towards the future.
Quiet lakes and golden skies are always on the side of the journey.
And dust does not accumulate on our precious memories. Because we always remember it on the train.

This piece is drawn by a special technique called "pixel impressionism".
This piece is made up entirely of pixels.
This style was invented by me and is the only one in the world.
A portion of the sales of this work will be donated to children around the world.
